homepage.content: Make it easier for others to track your work and cite what you make
homepage.watch_tutorial_video: Watch our tutorial video on creating a catalogue.
homepage.step_2: 2. Write your catalogue and generate a .json.
homepage.step_3: 3. Use your catalogue here to view, and generate a JSON-LD for data input aligned with Open-AIRE metadata standards.
homepage.step_4: 4. Store your catalogue files with your data, put them in a repository, or collaborate by sharing them with others.

homepage.upload_file: Upload a previous Catalogue Record or drag and drop one (.json file)

formpage.edit_tooltip: You can edit your catalogue record on this page.
formpage.write_tooltip: You can write your catalogue record on this page.

viewpage.no_catalogue: No catalogue loaded. Please upload a file first and only then can you view it.
viewpage.review_tooltip: You can review your catalogue record in a human-readable form on this page.
viewpage.view_tooltip: You can view your catalogue record in a human-readable form on this page.
